description:
•

Over 10 million people get infected from tuberculosis every year. 

1.5 million died in 2018- that’s a 15% mortality rate. 

TB is highly “contagious”! 

Why did everyone who’s wearing a mask now & telling others to not be selfish & protect the “herd” not wear one AT ALL last year for TB? 

Oh that’s right, because you only wear masks & gloves & bleach everything in sight when the corporate pharma media cartel, corrupt governors, & county health officers with ties to the CDC/WHO mandate them for a “virus” less deadly than seasonal flu & the flu shot itself (0.6)- and that’s *with* all the inflated & manipulated death certificates & phony statistics based on extremely flawed & inaccurate tests. 

•

Why didn’t we shut down the economy, order people to “shelter in place” & “social distance” & say “we’re all in this together” for tuberculosis? 

•

“The price of freedom is eternal vigilance. Indifference to this notion is the means by which we will secure our own oppression.”

-Thomas Jefferson

•

“Those who would give up essential Liberty, to purchase a little temporary Safety, deserve neither Liberty nor Safety.”

-Benjamin Franklin 

•

At the Constitutional Convention, Benjamin Franklin was approached by a group of citizens asking what sort of government the delegates had created. 
His answer was: ""A republic, if you can keep it."" 
•

By blindly acquiescing to the demands of known liars & murderers, aka the CULT, are we keeping it? Or are we getting closer to Communist China?

•

The brevity of Franklin’s response should not cause us to under-value its essential meaning: Constitutional Republics are not merely founded upon the consent of the people, they are also absolutely dependent upon the active & informed involvement of We the People for their continued good health.

•

“He who passively accepts evil is as much involved in it as he who helps to perpetrate it. He who accepts evil without protesting against it is really cooperating with it.” 

-Martin Luther King, Jr. 

•
•
•
